sentence.Network_cn: 一向乐观的皮特说,事情必定是会好转的.

entry.def: An optimist is someone who is hopeful about the future.

example.ex: Optimists reckon house prices will move up with inflation this year.
example.tran: 乐观人士认为今年的房价将会随通货膨胀而上涨。

means.word_mean: 1. a person disposed to take a favorable view of things

auth_sentence.content: I'm an optimist about getting this relationship right.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm an optimist about getting this relationship right.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm an optimist about getting this relationship right.

stems_affixes.word_buile: optim最好,乐观+al……的→adj.最佳的, 最理想的
optimist[n.乐天派, 乐观者]+ic……的→adj.乐观主义的
optim最好,乐观+um表示场地→adj.最适宜的 n.最适宜[条件]
optim最好,乐观+ism主义→n.乐观,乐观主义
optim最好,乐观+ist人→n.乐天派, 乐观者
optim最好,乐观+um表示场地→adj.最适宜的 n.最适宜[条件]

sentences.en: Pete, ever the optimist, said things were bound to improve.
sentences.cn: 一向乐观的皮特说，事情必定是会好转的。

sentences.en: Even optimists admit the outlook to be poor.
sentences.cn: 甚至乐观的人都认为前景不好。
